title: 请问一下 在vue里面引入js应该怎么配置 在本地浏览器可以跑 到移动端加载不到资源了 谢谢

comments.body: 具体说明下这个"引入 js"是什么意思. Weex 在 Android 平台没有完整的 DOM 不能通过 `<script>` 加载 js 代码, 可能是这个问题.

var hprose = require('../js/hprose.min.js');
我在vue里面引入了hprose的js在web可以跑 安卓跑不了了

安卓端报错如下03-13 14:32:08.619 24773-24797/com.example.cyyz.myweexdemo E/jsengine:  ReportException :undefined:684: TypeError: Object [object Object] has no method 'require'
03-13 14:32:08.619 24773-24797/com.example.cyyz.myweexdemo E/jsengine:  ReportException : TypeError: Object [object Object] has no method 'require'
                                                                           at Object.r (eval at callFunction ((weex):8676:16), <anonymous>:684:19)
                                                                           at __webpack_require__ (eval at callFunction ((weex):8676:16), <anonymous>:24:30)
                                                                           at Object.module.exports.wrapper.background (eval at callFunction ((weex):8676:16), <anonymous>:78:20)
                                                                           at __webpack_require__ (eval at callFunction ((weex):8676:16), <anonymous>:24:30)
                                                                           at Object.__vue_styles__ (eval at callFunction ((weex):8676:16), <anonymous>:57:13)
                                                                           at __webpack_require__ (eval at callFunction ((weex):8676:16), <anonymous>:24:30)
                                                                           at Object.defineProperty.value (eval at callFunction ((weex):8676:16), <anonymous>:44:18)
                                                                           at eval (eval at callFunction ((weex):8676:16), <anonymous>:47:10)
                                                                           at callFunction ((weex):8677:17)
                                                                           at Object.createInstance ((weex):8395:3)
03-13 14:32:08.619 24773-24797/com.example.cyyz.myweexdemo E/weex: reportJSException >>>> instanceId:4, exception function:createInstance, exception:TypeError: Object [object Object] has no method 'require'

之前安卓sdk的版本是0.9.5更新到最新版本报这个错
